Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork

Class ContextualEgoNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork
  • public class ContextualEgoNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a Contextual Ego Network, which is the conceptual model of our Heterogeneous Social Graph. It contains information about the various contexts, i.e. the different layers of the multi-layer network, and about the nodes (users) that belong to the contexts. Moreover, it divides the contexts into a current one, some active ones (that are kept in memory) and some inactive ones (that are serialized in dedicated files).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextualEgoNetwork

        public ContextualEgoNetwork​(Node ego)
        Deprecated.
        This constructor will be made protected in future versions. Call ContextualEgoNetwork.createOrLoad(egoName, egoData) and NOT ContextualEgoNetwork(new Node(egoName, egoData)).
        Creates a ContextualEgoNetwork.
        Parameters:
        ego - The ego Node

    • Method Detail

      • createOrLoad

        public static ContextualEgoNetwork createOrLoad​(java.lang.String egoName,
                                                java.lang.Object egoData)
        Instantiates a ContextualEgoNetwork by creating a new ego node with the given data. Loads a previously saved one if such a node exists.
        Parameters:
        egoName - - The name of the ego network's ego.
        egoData - - The data with which to create the network's node.
        Returns:
        the created or loaded contextual ego network

      • load

        public static ContextualEgoNetwork load​(java.lang.String egoName)
        Deprecated.
        This function will be removed in future versions. Call ContextualEgoNetwork.createOrLoad(egoName, null) instead.
        Creates an empty contextual ego network that corresponds to the ego with the given name (effectively determines the stored path) and uses a deserializer to parse it and its ego into memory. This requires that a ContextualEgoNetwork had been created through its constructor and saved in the past.
        Parameters:
        egoName - The name of the ego node
        Returns:
        the created ego network

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns:
        The path folder in which the ego network is saved

      • save

        public void save()
        Makes the getSerializer() save the contextual ego network. This includes all explicitly serializeable objects, namely the contexts and nodes.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Applies Context.cleanup() on all contexts

      • createContext

        public Context createContext​(java.lang.Object data)
        The default method to create a new context in a ContextualEgoNetwork.
        Parameters:
        data - The data that the context should hold.
        Returns:
        The newly created context

      • getOrCreateContext

        public Context getOrCreateContext​(java.lang.Object data)
        Returns a context that satisfies data.equals(context.getData()) . Overriding the Object.equals(Object) function of the query data can be used to affect the outcome of the obtained context. If no such context exists, a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        data - The query data that the created context should hold.
        Returns:
        The found or newly created context

      • removeContext

        public void removeContext​(Context context)
        Removes a given context from the ContextualEgoNetwork's contexts.
        Parameters:
        context - The given context

      • getContexts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Context> getContexts()
        Method to grant safe access all context of the contextual ego networks
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of contexts

      • setCurrent

        public void setCurrent​(Context context)
        Method to set a context in state Current.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be set as active, or null if no context should be active at the present time.

      • getCurrentContext

        public Context getCurrentContext()
        Method to return the current context.
        Returns:
        The current context.
        See Also:
        setCurrent(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context)

      • getEgo

        public Node getEgo()
        Shortcut to get the node of the ego
        Returns:
        the Node that serves as the ego of the contextual ego network

      • getOrCreateNode

        public Node getOrCreateNode​(java.lang.String nodeId,
                            java.lang.Object data)
        Searches for a node with the given id. If no such node is found, a new one is created using the given data.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The node's id
        data - The node's data (only used if a new node is created)
        Returns:
        The found or created node.
